record.id: field.name="print.override" and file.name="category" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: print.override
record.file.name: category

brief.brief: If selected (set to true), overrides the Incident Management print option set in the Company Record, and enables Old Style Printing.
Selecting this option reverses the setting in the System Wide Company Record. If printing is on in the System Wide Company Record, this option turns the printing off, and vice versa.
If the print option is true in the System Wide Company Record, Service Manager prints a hard copy of the current Incident record when it performs an open, update, or close.
